Quote.Author: Diane Arbus
Quote.QuoteValue: You see someone on the street, and essentially what you notice about them is the flaw

Quote.Author: Diane Arbus
Quote.QuoteValue: I really believe there are things nobody would see if I didn't photograph them

Quote.Author: Diane Arbus
Quote.QuoteValue: I never have taken a picture I've intended. They're always better or worse

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I never knew what I wanted to do, but I knew the kind of woman I wanted to be

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Insecurity is a waste of time

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Simplicity and sexiness, that's what people want. At a price that's not outrageous

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: The important thing is to take your time and not get stressed

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I design for the woman who loves being a woman

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is perfect in its imperfections, so you just have to go with the imperfections

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: My best friend is me, and I take good care of me

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: I get ideas about what's essential when packing my suitcase

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Just don't go to a place where everything is too expensive... it'll put your husband in a bad mood

Quote.Author: Diane von Furstenberg
Quote.QuoteValue: Italy will always have the best food

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Women have begun to see that if I go through that doorway, I take everybody through it

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Banning guns addresses a fundamental right of all Americans to feel safe

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Toughness doesn't have to come in a pinstripe suit

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning may not be everything, but losing has little to recommend it

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Ports are the gaping hole in America's homeland security

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Survival is nothing more than recovery

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Ninety percent of leadership is the ability to communicate something people want

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, that day is gone, and it will not occur again

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: It is my belief that tax credits only go to people who are making money, and they generally keep it

Quote.Author: Dianne Feinstein
Quote.QuoteValue: America is big enough to admit when it's wrong and confident enough to learn from its mistakes

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: If your parents never had children, chances are... neither will you

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: To label me an intellectual is a misunderstanding of what that is

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: If your parents never had children, chances are you won't either

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: Meryl Streep belongs on anybody's list of greats

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: It's no fun being a specimen

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as people will accept crap, it will be financially profitable to dispense it

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't feel old. I feel like a young man that has something wrong with him

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: I get a kick out of people saying I was funny

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: My IQ is somewhere between Spiro Agnew's and Albert Einstein's

Quote.Author: Dick Cavett
Quote.QuoteValue: Sloppy language leads to sloppy thought, and sloppy thought to sloppy legislation

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a deficit hawk

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: Reagan proved deficits don't matter

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't pay a lot of attention, frankly, to what Barack Obama says

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easy to take liberty for granted, when you have never had it taken from you

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: We must be prepared to face our responsibilities and be willing to use force if necessary

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: I do find that the mainstream media oftentimes is what I would consider off base or has a bias

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: Direct threats require decisive action

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: Except for the occasional heart attack, I never felt better

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to make America the best place in the world to do business

Quote.Author: Dick Cheney
Quote.QuoteValue: We will, in fact, be greeted as liberators

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: Every song is like a painting

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: I called it Rockabilly 'cause I was rocking the strums, which you're not supposed to do

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a saying. If you want someone to love you forever, buy a dog, feed it and keep it around

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: I almost had to have my leg amputated because of an infection

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't eat fish. It's 6,000 parts DDT per million all over the world, not counting radiation

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually first picked up an ukulele before I picked up a guitar

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: The Stratocaster is like the Rolls-Royce. It can never be surpassed

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: You know what the doctors call me? 'The Cancer Warrior.'

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: I make jokes because humor is the greatest healing factor that there is

Quote.Author: Dick Dale
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever you do, don't take shortcuts. It's great advice to take and live by

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: If it wasn't for Abe Lincoln, I'd still be on the open market

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: I never learned hate at home, or shame. I had to go to school for that

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have a good mother and no father, God kind of sits in. It's not enough, but it helps

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a limit on how much information you can keep bottled up

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is very dangerous if you just have love and don't have the ability to be lovable

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: Once I realised the value of making people laugh, I got very good at it. Fast

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: My belief is, you know, certain things have to be explained that's never been explained

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a God force inside of you that gives you a will to live

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything we do we should look at in terms of millions of people who can't afford it

Quote.Author: Dick Gregory
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't mind paying taxes - if I knew they were going to a friendly country

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: I've made peace with insecurity... because there is no security of any kind

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: Women will never be as successful as men because they have no wives to advise them

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved to fall down

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: I've retired so many times now it's getting to be a habit

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's being thrown at the wolves, we call it in our business

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't work with my brother without laughing

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: I went from my mother to my wife. And to this day, I can't bear to be alone

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret to keeping moving is keeping moving

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a loner. I have to have a life partner

Quote.Author: Dick Van Dyke
Quote.QuoteValue: But once we got on the air, everybody except Morey Amsterdam pretty much stuck to the script

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: My mindset is always to be victorious, to win the match

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I do my best; I go onto the pitch and I play to the best of my ability

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be competitive; I want to run all over - I want to win

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't put wings on me; I am no angel

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: Chelsea's fans love me a lot, even more than in Atletico. Figure that!

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: I wished I could go back to Atletico; I'm not going to lie

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: Life has many turns

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: There are managers who always say what people want to hear. I think that's not good

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important to be right physically

Quote.Author: Diego Costa
Quote.QuoteValue: Check my records: you'll find I've never caused a bad injury to a player

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother thinks I am the best. And I was raised to always believe what my mother tells me

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course in the first matches you are more careful, perhaps more careful than you should be

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: To see the ball, to run after it, makes me the happiest man in the world

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: You can say a lot of things about me, but you can never say I don't take risks

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: I gave all I had. Now I want to enjoy my family

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd give my life to be the national team coach

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem is that they are all stars at Madrid. You need someone to carry the water to the well

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: There are hundreds of Beckhams playing football all over the world

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not desperate but I know that some day I'll be the coach again of some team

Quote.Author: Diego Maradona
Quote.QuoteValue: I am black or white, I'll never be grey in my life

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was 13, I was just figuring out how to play 'Eruption,' poorly, by Eddie Van Halen

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, the last thing I want to do is be involved in politics

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: And if I want to get involved in choosing sides, I usually pick hockey or football

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: I do see the world as being different for girls - especially now, having daughters

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up in Arizona, I love fireworks, shooting off bottle rockets and M80s

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: I love singing fun songs; I've built a career on them

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge fan of Billy Idol. I spiked my hair every day like him in 7th and 8th grade

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a member of the George Jones fan club, and I'm a member of U2's fan club

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I've claimed the right to be any version of me that I want to be

Quote.Author: Dierks Bentley
Quote.QuoteValue: That's what we get to do as songwriters, right? You get to explore stuff

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst advice I ever received from my dad was to play by the book

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: If you improvise a riff and the crowd immediately reacts to it, you know you're on to something

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Always have a collection of your favorite CDs with you

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Every song is different

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of bands whine about the road and how tough it is

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to skip school and paint my face with Ace Frehley Kiss make-up

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: It kills me when I see some metal band trying to pass themselves off as an 'alternative band.'

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I would just listen to records and learn what I could, then just roll it over and over and over

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm into sounds, man

Quote.Author: Dimebag Darrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Make your heart bleed! Put your soul into that damn thing. And try new things

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: Obama gets his identity and his ideology from his father

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, victory isn't measured by winning in the traditional sense

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: Christianity has always embraced both reason and faith

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: Barack Obama is the most antibusiness president in a generation, perhaps in American history

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: A bigot is simply a sociologist without credentials

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: Other countries have been founded by 'accidents of force.' America is a creation of thought

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: I love America, but I chose America

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: Christianity is the very root and foundation of Western civilization

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: I would argue that the issue of God and the issue of science have the same roots

Quote.Author: Dinesh D'Souza
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to give Michael Moore a run for his money

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only a finger's difference between a wise man and a fool

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: What I like to drink most is wine that belongs to others

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: Dogs and philosophers do the greatest good and get the fewest rewards

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: Stand a little less between me and the sun

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: The sun too penetrates into privies, but is not polluted by them

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: In a rich man's house there is no place to spit but his face

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: He has the most who is most content with the least

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: Why not whip the teacher when the pupil misbehaves?

Quote.Author: Diogenes
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is one soul abiding in two bodies

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved the idea of not being what people expect me to be

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: I advocate glamour. Every day. Every minute

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: My beauty icons are women whose images are self-created

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: I started dressing vintage when I was a teenager because I didn't have money for designer clothes

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't feel I have an alter ego

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: Physical beauty isn't so impressive to me

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd say the only time I ever get nervous is around great ballet dancers or people I really admire

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: I really believe that beauty comes from health - sensible eating and exercise

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: I like having my cellphone. I like the Internet. I like being different

Quote.Author: Dita Von Teese
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more of an exaggerator than a liar

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: I really believe that some things happen for a reason, and they make you a better person

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: After certain ups and downs, a person does change, and I have changed for good

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are good to people, they reciprocate with good behaviour

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: I look forward to a life partner who can look after me and respect me

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: In India, public display of affection is frowned upon

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: Small things make me happy, and I laugh out loud on the silliest of jokes!

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: Never fight with or disrespect your partner in front of other people

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: My best memories in life are with my elder sister Priyanka Tiwari and my brother Aishwarya Tripathi

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: It feels good when you learn to move on in life

Quote.Author: Divyanka Tripathi
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a memory problem. My family and friends call me Lady Ghajini

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: You gotta water your plants. Nobody can water them for you

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: Key is never be afraid of being yourself. Never!

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: I want more of my favorite artists or more of the guy that makes the anthems. I want more

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to appeal to everyone. Because I'm not saying I'm the best, but we the best

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: I wake up every day inspiring myself, because God gave me life

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an entrepreneur. I'm a young mogul. I'm blessed

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my major keys is actually the master keys: God

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I would run for president

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: Jeb Bush, I appreciate you. You a leader. You a Bush

Quote.Author: DJ Khaled
Quote.QuoteValue: It's safe to say headphones is a good business

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: I just find myself happy with the simple things. Appreciating the blessings God gave me

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: I been the same dude my whole life

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: Do dirt, get dirt. So I treat people with the same respect that I want

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day, I get closer to God. Every day, my will to do the right thing gets stronger

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to disrespect you, don't disrespect me

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: I know I may have done some bad things, but I'm not a bad person

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a difference between violence and senseless violence

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't walk around big headed. I'm not a superstar

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like Sony appreciates good music from a talented artist

Quote.Author: DMX
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody's upset with every movie

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: Love, peace and soul

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always a pleasure to find something that matters

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: Almost all of what I learned about mounting and hosting a dance show I learned from Dick Clark

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: When you come up with a good idea, you don't have to do a whole lot. The idea does it for you

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: When I have a job to do, time means nothing. I lose patience with people who work on a clock

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: I am just convinced that people want to see people on TV who are more like themselves

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody really invents anything that hasn't been done before

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: There were three great child singing stars: Michael Jackson, Stevie Wonder and Jackie Washington

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: I had difficulty working for other people

Quote.Author: Don Cornelius
Quote.QuoteValue: Who's more important than Diana Ross?

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: Hypocrisy is the mother of all evil and racial prejudice is still her favourite child

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't promote boxing, I promote people. Boxing is a catalyst to bring people together

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: You go for the quality of the performance, not the longevity of it

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: Martin Luther King took us to the mountain top: I want to take us to the bank

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing I love more in life than turning around a bigot

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: You can be the greatest guy in the world but if you ain't got no heart, you ain't gonna survive

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: I will fight for America until the day I drop

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an ardent American Football fan

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't rule the world, but what you can do is win the world with love and understanding

Quote.Author: Don King
Quote.QuoteValue: If a bullfrog had wings it wouldn't bump his behind every time he hopped

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: I am here and I'm alive. That's enough

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is unknown. To open the heart in trust is unknown. They say love hurts. It doesn't have to

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: Respect is one of the greatest expressions of love

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: When we respect everybody around us, we are in peace with everybody around us

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: Every human is an artist. And this is the main art that we have: the creation of our story

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: Be Skeptical, but learn to listen

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: Be impeccable with your word

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: Always do your best

Quote.Author: Don Miguel Ruiz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what I am. And it's not important

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't study comedy; it's within you. It's a personality. My humor is an attitude

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: Struggling is hard because you never know what's at the end of the tunnel

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: My life was in Montreal years ago. Best food in the world

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: Who picks your clothes - Stevie Wonder?

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: The old days were the old days. And they were great days. But now is now

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people say funny things, but I say things funny

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: I ride a recumbent bike for half an hour every day

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: You know what's funny to me? Attitude

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: Political correctness? In my humor, I never talk about politics. I was never much into all that

Quote.Author: Don Rickles
Quote.QuoteValue: Las Vegas is the boiling pot of entertainment

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: The superior man blames himself. The inferior man blames others

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody that's a Dolphins fan feels they're headed in the right direction

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is not forever and failure isn't fatal

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: I never felt I knew it all. I always felt there's something new to learn, something new to do

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know any other way to lead but by example

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: And this year is going to be the 25th anniversary of the 17-0 team, the only undefeated season

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: Sure, luck means a lot in football. Not having a good quarterback is bad luck

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: The one thing that I know is that you win with good people

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I never want to be accused of is not working

Quote.Author: Don Shula
Quote.QuoteValue: And I coached against Mike when he was an assistant with the Bears and they won that football game

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything important always begins from something trivial

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Many times I have written something, and after it was published, I understood what I was saying

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: However alert we are, antiquity remains an unknown, unanticipated galaxy

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Contentment is work so engrossing that you do not know that you are working

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Friends die, friends become demented, friends quarrel, friends drift with old age into silence

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I really feel better about aging at the age of 86 than I did at 70

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd heard of writers who say they hate to write. Not me. I love to do it

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: For better or worse, poetry is my life

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: Sound had always been my portal to poetry, but in the beginning, sound was imagined through the eye

Quote.Author: Donald Hall
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a child, I loved old people. My New Hampshire grandfather was my model human being

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: Most art is fragile and some should be placed and never moved away

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: After all, the work isn't the point; the piece is

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: Pollock looks unusual and radical even now

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, in any art there are a lot of technical things that you can get to like

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, its very exasperating when you can't get it right

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't sufficient interest in objects or anything I can see around me to do what Oldenburg does

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: And that Newman wasn't, and yet to me Pollock is just as radical and unlike Expressionism as Newman

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: I think most of the best new work is intended to have much more impact at once

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: There's probably more in the American tradition than people give the place credit for

Quote.Author: Donald Judd
Quote.QuoteValue: They certainly aren't connected with the old geometric art. My work isn't geometric in that sense

Quote.Author: Donald Rumsfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't blame the boss. He has enough problems

Quote.Author: Donald Rumsfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are not criticized, you may not be doing much

Quote.Author: Donald Rumsfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't necessarily avoid sharp edges. Occasionally they are necessary to leadership

Quote.Author: Donald Rumsfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easier to get into something than to get out of it

Quote.Author: Donald Rumsfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Death has a tendency to encourage a depressing view of war

Quote.Author: Donald Rumsfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't speak ill of your predecessors or successors. You didn't walk in their shoes

Quote.Author: Donald Rumsfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to do well is to do well
